svcproc.title: Hood Seal
svcproc.para: To install the hood seal, release the hood latches both sides and tilt hood forward if not already tilted.

figure.caption: Figure 102. Hood Seal Remove and Install

step1.para: Align the hood seal across the entire top surface of the cowl lip.
Begin peeling back the adhesive protective strip.
Locate the christmas tree attachment hole and insert the tree through the hood seal and adhesive.
Insert the fastener in the cowl hole, apply pressure to the seal causing the adhesive to attach to the cowl lip.

Continue peeling the adhesive strip cover material and press hood / cowl seal in place on the forward edge of the cowl. Continue pressing down on seal causing the adhesive to attach to the portion on the cowl edge.
Insert the christmas tree fastener through the opposite side hood seal into the mounting hole in the cowl.
Check that seal is pushed down on edge as far as is allowable. Lower hood and secure hood latch.
